mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM eqi_equipment AS eqi LEFT JOIN base_equip_info AS bei ON eqi.equip_type_id = bei.equip_type_id LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_code = bpi.process_code
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
mapper.update: update eqi_equipment set equipment_id=#{equipmentId}, equipment_name=#{equipmentName}, equipment_install_location=#{equipmentInstallLocation}, equip_type_id=#{equipTypeId}, equipment_continue_port=#{equipmentContinuePort}, equipment_ip=#{equipmentIp}, acc_point_res_id=#{accPointResId}, enable=#{enable}, remarks=#{remarks} where equipment_int=#{equipmentInt}
mapper.delete:
delete from eqi_equipment where equipment_int in
#{id}
